overview:
Streaming Flix â€“ The Newest, Fastest-Growing Online Video Entertainment Network Streaming Flix is making its way into homes everywhere as the newest, fastest-growing online video entertainment network! You can now stream, rent and buy movies and TV shows, review movies in theaters, and read entertainment news â€“ all in one convenient location. Using the latest streaming technology, Streaming Flix provides you with instant access to streaming videos for unlimited viewing. New releases, classics and award-winning TV shows and movies are also available to rent on your computer or purchase on DVD and Blu-ray. Movie and TV entertainment lovers can choose from the growing library of over 5,000 DVD/Blu-ray titles and 14,000 digital downloads in all genres, from action and comedy to independent films and kidsâ€™ favorites. And if you want to be in the know on whatâ€™s hot in the local box office, watch trailers and buy tickets for upcoming movies, keep up with your favorite actors or get movie reviews & editorâ€™s picks, you can do this with Streaming Flix, too!

So, how does Streaming Flix work? Anyone can browse our video library for new releases or all-time favorite movies and TV shows. Thereâ€™s also a download-to-rent/own option provided by our partner RoxioÂ® CinemaNow. To access RoxioÂ® CinemaNow, just go to the Rent tab on the Streaming Flix website. On StreamingFlix.com, you can also view the box office top 10, movies coming soon, trailers, actor profiles, and catch up on the entertainment news and Hollywood gossip with the Streaming Flix blog. Additional features available to the Streaming Flix VIP Members include unlimited streaming from our Premium Channels, discounts on DVD and Blu-ray purchases, and the Streaming Flix Reward Points Program. There is also a basic free membership option. Whatâ€™s the difference between a free membership and a VIP Membership? Free members have access to the latest new releases and the entire Streaming Flix DVD and Blu-ray library at retail prices. They can also review movies in theaters, purchase movie tickets and read the latest entertainment news. For added convenience, free membership provides a personal profile where you can save and store favorite movies to â€œWatch Laterâ€ and keep billing and shipping information for future purchases.
The Streaming Flix VIP Membership offers several exciting benefits: â€¢ 25% off on DVD and Blu-ray movies â€¢ Free shipping on all purchases â€¢ Unlimited viewing on streaming movies â€¢ National Lampoon, NoGoodTV, iConz of Rock and Koan Premium Channels â€¢ Automatic enrollment in the Streaming Flix Reward Points program â€¢ 5,000 instant Reward Points with sign up The VIP Membership subscription fee is $9.99 per month, if paid by credit card. Those customers who do not have or do not want to use a credit card can add the Streaming Flix VIP Membership to their home phone bill for $14.95 per month ($9.99 subscription fee + $4.96 convenience charge). Monthly home phone payment is an easy and safe option available exclusively from Streaming Flix. Does StreamingFlix offer a free trial of their VIP Membership? Yes! Free 2-week trial subscription is available to users that register with a major credit or debit card (Visa, MasterCard, American Express or Discover). The free trial includes access to all VIP Membership benefits, and you can cancel the membership at any time. How do I access the streaming movies? Streaming Flix VIP Members are able to stream videos directly to their computers with no additional software or installation required. To view the videos, just log into your Streaming Flix account, select the desired video available for streaming and play it. Find streaming movies quickly by browsing our Premium Channels. You have the option to stop, pause, and restart the video at any time. Itâ€™s that simple. What are the Premium Channels? Streaming Flix Premium Channels are included in the VIP Membership. Currently, there are four but Streaming Flix is working to add more channels on an ongoing basis. National Lampoon offers hilarious videos that will have you laughing for days. NoGoodTV provides all of the juicy, uncensored celebrity interviews you canâ€™t get enough of. iConz of Rock gives you a behind the scenes look at the rock stars you love. And Koan offers family entertainment and award-winning feature films and documentaries.

What exactly is the â€œDownload-to-Rent/Ownâ€ option? Through an agreement with RoxioÂ® CinemaNow, Streaming Flix is able to offer the instant rental and purchase of movies and TV shows in digital format online, using your computer. Streaming Flix members can access RoxioÂ® CinemaNowâ€™s video titles through the â€œRentâ€ section of the Streaming Flix website. The RoxioÂ® CinemaNow library contains many feature-length and short films, music concerts, and television programs, so there is no shortage of entertainment available to the Streaming Flix member.

With download-to-rent/own all you need to do is download the free Windows Media PlayerÂ® to your computer straight from the RoxioÂ® CinemaNow website. Itâ€™s fast and easy to use with a one-time set up process. Then, just select a movie youâ€™d like to rent, click on it to download it, and youâ€™ve got access to it for the next 24 hours. With download-to-own, the process is the same â€“ select a movie, click on it to purchase and download it to your computer, then sit back and enjoy! Best of all, with the download-to-own option, the movie is stored on your computer and you can watch it again anytime you want. What is the Streaming Flix Reward Points Program? We have recently launched the new Reward Points Program for VIP Members, which rewards our loyal VIP customers for staying with us and making DVD and Blu-ray purchases on our website. Signing up for a VIP Membership instantly earns subscribers 5,000 points and they continue to get points with every purchase and every monthly renewal. What are the points worth? They can be easily redeemed for free DVDs, Blu-ray purchases and, coming soon, movie tickets. You can get a free DVD or movie ticket for as little as 10,000 points! To view the point balance, accrual and spending history, or redeem points, simply log in to your StreamingFlix account and go to My Profile, then click on the â€œRewardsâ€ tab. By being an active Streaming Flix VIP Member, you can get free movie rewards and share then with your friends and family. What else does Streaming Flix have to offer? You can now buy movie tickets on Streaming Flix through FandangoÂ®, the ultimate movie ticketing service. It provides customers with access to over 16,000 movie screens and 6,000 theatres nationwide and connects them with showtimes for all of the new releases in local movies theatres. You can also view current box office information, movies coming soon and watch trailers before you step out to see the latest flicks on the big screen.
But wait, there is more! Streaming Flix is also your destination for the most up-to-date gossip on all Hollywood actors and the movies they star in. With actor profiles and the Streaming Flix entertainment news blog, you will always be in the know about the professional and personal lives of Hollywood stars, the hottest television and film projects, and of course the Red Carpet with TV and movie awards! Check out Streaming Flix for yourself and see how you can get the hottest new releases, unlimited streaming movies, big savings on DVD and Blu-Ray purchases, entertainment news and free movie rewards at your fingertips!
